name: Pixels in Black
description:
Welcome do the Agency!

Aliens are invading the world and we need help to stop them while hiding the truth from the population!

We will provide you with a black tuxedo, a laser gun and a memory eraser device that I can't say the name cause I might get sued later!

You must kill every alien and calm down the citizens at all costs! Failure to meet this objective will result in a unprecedented world caos. 

Controls

WASD/directionals: movement

Left Mouse Button: Fire Lassr

Right Mouse Button: Memory Eraser

Disclaimer: Although everyone had 1 week to make a game, I had a busy family and job week so I had around 10 hours only to make mine! So I slapped some lovely kenney tilesets with the pixeldudesmaker chars together and spent most of the time focusing on the game mechanics! Hope you all like the result and please be kind in the comments! love all!😁
